General.Name: Goldplat PLC
General.Description: Goldplat PLC, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a mining services company in South Africa and Ghana. It recovers gold and other precious metals from by-products, contaminated soil, and other precious metal material from mining and other industries. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Salisbury House, London, United Kingdom, EC2M 5PS
